articles.title: Google will BAN 'sugar daddy' apps from September 1 in new sexual content restrictions - Daily Mail
articles.description: Google is banning sugar daddy apps following feedback from governments and user advocacy groups concerned with safety, the Menlo Park, California-based tech giant said.
articles.content:
Google will ban 'sugar daddy' apps from its Google Play app store from September 1 this year, the firm has quietly revealed in an update.

articles.title: Researchers create UV-enabled flexible wearable technology - Nanowerk
articles.description: To enable the development of wearable devices that possess advanced ultraviolet (UV) detection functions, researchers have created a new type of light sensor that is both flexible and highly sensitive.
